org.apache.james.dnsservice.library.netmatcher

Class NetMatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.james.dnsservice.library.netmatcher.NetMatcher

  • public class NetMatcher
extends Object
    NetMatcher Class is used to check if an ipAddress match a network. NetMatcher provides a means for checking whether a particular IPv4 or IPv6 address or domain name is within a set of subnets.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NetMatcher(Collection<String> nets, DNSService dnsServer)
      Create a new instance of Netmatcher.
      NetMatcher(String[] nets, DNSService dnsServer)
      Create a new instance of Netmatcher.

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Can be overwritten for logging
      boolean matchInetNetwork(InetAddress ip)
      Return true if passed InetAddress match a network which was used to construct the Netmatcher.
      boolean matchInetNetwork(String hostIP)
      The given String may represent an IP address or a host name.
      String toString()
      Return a sorted representation of the inet networks.
